selfunverify.name: selfunverify
selfunverify.description: Temporarily remove access to yourself on the server.

konec.name: end
konec.description: End date and time, or duration of access removal.

pristupy.name: accesses
pristupy.description: A list of allowable accesses. Separate with a comma, space, or semicolon.

access.name: access
access.description: View a list of user permissions.

dnes.name: today
dnes.description: Finding out who's birthday is today.

kdy.name: when
kdy.description: The date of your birthday. (Format: yyyy-mm-dd, if you don't want a year, enter 0001 as the year).

mam.name: have
mam.description: Ask if I have my birthday saved?

list-keepables.name: list-keepables
list-keepables.description: List of allowable accesses when selfunverify

board.name: board
board.description: TOP 10 channel statistics you can access.

kachna.name: duck
kachna.description: Finds the current state of the duck club.

user.name: user
user.description: Show statistics of only one user

animovane.name: animated
animovane.description: Do I want to show animated emotes in the list too?

kasparek.name: kasparek
kasparek.description: He asks your mom what kind of **** you have.

zaklad.name: base
zaklad.description: Tell the bot in which base to greet you.

remind.name: remind
remind.description: A reminder for a specific date

create.name: create
create.description: Create a reminder for a specific date.

komu.name: recipient
komu.description: Designation of the user who wishes to receive notifications

kdy.name: when
kdy.description: Reminder date and time. It must be in the future.

zprava.name: message
zprava.description: The message that will be sent to the user.

tajne.name: secret
tajne.description: This notification should be hidden from others.

upozornit.name: remind
upozornit.description: Whether to notify the target user early.

kanal.name: channel
kanal.description: The channel you want to find something in.

emote.name: emote
emote.description: Submitting a proposal to add a new emote.

emote.name: emote
emote.description: Option to design an emote based on an existing emote (from another server).

attachment.name: attachment
attachment.description: Ability to design an emote based on an image.

feature.name: feature
feature.description: Submission of a proposal for a new feature to GrillBot.
